name: Sammy Weathers
location: Cottonwood Cove, in the slave pen

topics.response_text: {despair}You killed my kin. Why is this happening to me?

topics.topic_text: Don't worry your little head, Sammy. <Set off the explosive in her collar>

topics.response_text: {player already killed your mother or brother doing this}So you can kill more of us? Get away from me!
Hurry up. The guards keep eyeing me like I'm a piece of meat.

topics.topic_text: <Give Sammy the key from Canyon Runner>
topics.response_text: {Doesn't make sense}Why free me now? After what you done? I ain't saying thank you.

topics.topic_text: Hold still. <Deactivate the charge and remove her collar>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You did it! Thank you so much!

topics.topic_text: Never mind. I'll see if there is another way to free you.
topics.response_text: Yeah, like get the key from the slavemaster or pay him to release us?

topics.topic_text: I've paid for your freedom. You're free to go.
topics.response_text: {Shocked disbelief}Freedom? I don't know where we'll get a new start, but any place is better than rotting with the legion or Frank.

description:
Sammy Weathers is a 13 year-old Caucasian Female.

A young girl held captive in the slave pen at Cottonwood Cove. Sammy has a thin frame, dirty blonde hair, and haunted eyes that betray her youth and suffering. She wears tattered clothing that barely fits, a constant reminder of her life as a Legion slave.

Sammy Weathers's Personality: Fearful and distrustful due to her traumatic experiences, Sammy shows moments of resilience and quiet defiance. She harbors resentment toward her father for abandoning the family during the Legion attack. Despite her circumstances, she maintains a flicker of hope for freedom and reunion with her remaining family.

Sammy Weathers's Backstory: Born in the Mojave Wasteland to Frank Weathers and his wife, Sammy spent her early years moving from settlement to settlement with her family, including her younger brother. In 2280, during a relocation journey, their caravan was ambushed by Caesar's Legion forces. Her father fled in the chaos, abandoning his family to their fate. Sammy, her mother, and brother were captured and taken to Cottonwood Cove, where they were separated and forced into slavery. Her mother was later sold to a Legion officer in Fortification Hill, while Sammy remains in the Cottonwood Cove slave pen, awaiting an uncertain future.
